title: Timeline - Curiosity
description: INTERESTING things. Take a note here for future read.

events.title: SIM CB
events.desription: You are the top banker in charge of the central bank. Your role is to maximize economic potential by putting the right amount of money in circulation, to increase the GDP of your village: the number of apples it produces. Your only lever changes the central bank interest rate. Good luck!

events.title: Stack Overflow Dev Servey 2022
events.desription: The questions we ask in our annual survey help us improve the Stack Overflow community and the platform that serves them. The challenge and opportunity for us is to continue expanding and improving our ability to help all developers and to make them feel welcome in our community. Read on for more great insights about the attitudes, tools, and environments that are shaping the art and practice of software today.

events.title: Glossary Page Template
events.desription: A single HTML page with a built-in editor for creating a glossary that can be hosted anywhere.

events.title: Explaining Code using ASCII Art
events.desription: People tend to be visual: we use pictures to understand problems. Mainstream programming languages, on the other hand, operate in an almost completely different kind of abstract space, leaving a big gap between programs and pictures. This piece is about pictures drawn using a text character set and then embedded in source code. I love these! The other day I asked around on Twitter for more examples and the responses far exceeded expectations (thanks everyone!). There are a ton of great examples in the thread; here I’ve categorized a few of them. Click on images go to the repositories.

events.title: Overturned Roe v. Wade
events.desription: The final decision ends weeks of speculation following the leaking of a draft opinion in May, which detailed the Supreme Court’s resolve to strike down the ruling.

events.title: How IC Gets Stuck
events.desription: How to find data points to support your constructive feedback on your peers? - Pay attention to how they get stuck.

events.title: Red Engine: Python Scheduler
events.desription: Red Engine is a modern scheduling framework for Python applications. It is simple, clean and extensive.

events.title: Good Exp of Reading Blogs
events.desription: This is a good example of how to write blog after reading a book. Check the structure and learn from it.
